import React from 'react' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import i18next from "i18next"; import './LanguageSelection.css' import translation from '../assets/images/translation.png' import spanish from '../assets/images/spanish.png' import english from '../assets/images/english.png' const LanguageSelection = () => { const selected = localStorage.getItem("i18nextLng") || "es"; const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
) } export default LanguageSelection
